cn.sharesdk.framework.authorize

Class AuthorizeAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.sharesdk.framework.authorize.AuthorizeAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyAdapter

    public class AuthorizeAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    the adapter of authorize page

    AuthorizeAdapter is the lifecycle listener of the authorize page( including onCreate(), onDestroy() etc. ), you can override and control the ui logic and events of the page by calling getActivity(), getTitleLayout(), getWebBody(), isNotitle() etc.
